introduction: Is learning languages good for you? For audio and transcript downloads, a quiz and a list of the wor

vocabulary.definition: a person who knows and is able to use several languages
vocabulary.example: My friend is a polyglot who can speak five languages fluently.

vocabulary.definition: to listen or pay attention to something
vocabulary.example: It's important to tune in to the needs of your customers to provide better service.

vocabulary.definition: doing several different things at the same time
vocabulary.example: As a working parent, she is constantly juggling her career and family responsibilities.

vocabulary.definition: exercise for your brain that can make it stronger
vocabulary.example: Solving challenging puzzles is a great brain workout.

vocabulary.definition: to learn something, usually by being in the environment where it happens
vocabulary.example: Living in France helped him pick up the French language quickly.
